# Source: https://github.com/TigerVNC/tigervnc/wiki/Keyboard-shortcuts

### Menu 

[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](#menu)

F8 provides access to a menu.

### Minimize 

[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](#minimize)

F8 -\> Z

### Fullscreen 

[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](#fullscreen)

F8 =\> SHIFT + V

### Options 

[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](#options)

F8 =\> O

## macOS 

[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](#macos)

Several keyboard modifiers are adjusted per [https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/tigervnc-users/Ixn62_ZsRGI](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/tigervnc-users/Ixn62_ZsRGI):

> \...we swap some modifiers around because of the way Alt works on that platforms. We do the following translation

> -   CmdL =\> AltL
> -   CmdR =\> SuperL (\"win\" key)
> -   AltL =\> ModeSwitch (alternative AltGr)
> -   AltR =\> Level3Shift (AltGr)

The wiki is read-only because of malware spam that GitHub refuses to provide protection agains. Contact the maintainers directly with changes you\'d like to make.
